title: Not able to log in
body: All day yesterday, 11.27.16, I was unable to get past the login screen. At the beginning, I had not downloaded the new client yet. Every time I got to the log in screen, I would type my username and password, press enter, and wait. The outcome was usually a pop-up window in the client saying that I couldn't connect to pvp.net, and had a link to some suggestions to try and fix that. Tried going through internet explorer settings, internet settings, used the hextech repair tool, used the built-in repair tool, downloaded the new client to see if I'd get a different outcome, used the hextech repair tool AGAIN, repatched, restarted my computer, and tried all of the troubleshooting again.

replies.body:
PvP.net is a pretty important service for League, and these types of issues are often caused by incompatible local network settings that conflict with League. I'd recommend working through all the steps listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are all in the green.

Let me know if this caused any change.
